search_results.title: Michael Bird (theologian)
search_results.snippet: Michael F. Bird (born 18 November 1974) is an Australian New Testament scholar, theologian and Anglican priest. The Reverend. Michael Bird.

search_results.title: Michael F. Bird: books, biography, latest update
search_results.snippet: Michael F. Bird is a leading academic on New Testament studies and Christian Theology. He is Lecturer in Theology at Ridley College in Melbourne, Australia.

search_results.title: Kai Bird
search_results.snippet: Kai Bird (born September 2, 1951) is an American author and columnist, best known for his works on the atomic bombings of Hiroshima and Nagasaki
